name: rfUST
description: rfUST is a token on Harmony with deflationary properties and automatic yield generation for the holders. 7% tax is applied to all transactions which are distributed to holders just for holding their tokens in UST. Another 2% tax are automatically added to a locked liquidity pool to generate an ever rising price floor! The tax applied is meant to incentivize long term holding and the anti-whale mechanics are implemented with a maximum wallet allowance of 30 billion tokens at launch.The token will be used for a dAPP called reflectaverse as in game currency.
